conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D axonometric transformation produced with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent volume and depth. Viewing angle clearly exposes internal geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout hallucinations. The living room has been replaced with a bedroom; the pantry area is merged; the dining area orientation is rotated; stair placement is duplicated.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is high quality but misplaced (e.g., bed in the living room area). Kitchen features are well rendered but not aligned to the specific L-shape/island in the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering, excellent lighting, and clear structural distinctions.

detected_errors.description: The living room/foyer area from the 2D plan has been incorrectly rendered as a bedroom.
The central pantry and hallway layout is significantly simplified and distorted.

summary: While the 3D rendering quality is high, it fails to maintain the geometric fidelity of the original floor plan, specifically regarding room identification and internal wall placement.
